608600.name: Fantasy Grounds - Daring Tales of Adventure 06: The Palladium Peril (Savage Worlds)
608600.description:
A mysterious statue and evil Nazis, looks like trouble for our heroes!
This exciting pulp tale takes the heroes on a wild ride of Europe from England to
Vienna. Their mission is simple, prevent an ancient but powerful magical statue
falling into the hands of the Third Riech. The magical Palladium was once the treasure
of Troy and its magic was most evident during the Trojan War. Centuries later the
Palladium has been lost to history and its location a mystery. Now the Nazi's are
after the statue to aid their evil cause. Can the heroes prevent the Palladium falling
into the Fuhrer's hands making Berlin almost impregnable?
Daring Tales of Adventure: The Palladium Peril is the sixth two-fisted pulp adventure
from the popular Savage Worlds series from Triple Ace Games.
This product is an installable module for use with the Fantasy Ground II virtual
tabletop. The adventure module has been carefully organized to streamline gameplay
and includes, story elements, personalities, items, vehicles and images. These can
be modified within your Fantasy Grounds campaign as needed. The Savage Worlds ruleset
and a Full license of Fantasy Grounds II are required to use this product.
Author: Paul Wiggy Wade-Williams
Fantasy Grounds II Conversion: Clemens Meyer
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Clemens Meyer
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
